name: Just Defend
description:
You must protect the tower from air strikes in order to have secure communication between two military bases
One hit from the enemy and BOOM! , you are closer to death.
Your victory depends on your finger tapping skills.
Destroy all gathering enemies around the tower and DEFEND it !
The more time you handle to put your enemies behind the line, the best time you achieve with a medal of honor.
JUST DEFEND !

Product features:
  • The best time killer, now for free
  • 3 enemies to destroy
  • 3 special attacks to support your defense
  • 4 medals of honor to earn
  • Challenge your friend to beat your score
